org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver
Interface ClientEndpoint

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientEndpointTCP, ClientEndpointUDP
interface ClientEndpoint

Abstraction of the client socket. Acts as a wrapper for Socket and DatagramSocket to provide uniform behavior.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Benny Bottema
See Also:
ClientEndpointUDP.handleDatagramPacket(DatagramPacket)

Method Summary
 void close()
          Calls the close method on the embedded socket, or in case of UDP, remove itself from parent ServerEndpointUDP list of known clients.
